special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
After a standard system update you need to reboot your computer to make
all the necessary changes.
threat: A remote NFS server (attacker) could exploit this flaw to cause a denial of service.
For application on which fscaps are in use a local attacker can disable address space randomization to make attacking the process with raised privileges easier.
A remote NFS server (attacker) could cause a denial of service (OOPS).
